PDATE - Pay by date
Pay by date. Date to pay in full by: 11/11/2025.

offences.offenceLegislation: Contrary to section 8(1) of the Theft Act 1968.
offences.offenceLegislationWelsh: Yn groes i adran 8(1) Deddf Dwyn 1968.
offences.wording: From 13th November 2018, an aggravated version of this offence applies where the offence is committed against an emergency worker acting in the exercise of his / her functions as such a worker, as per section 1 of the Assaults on emergency Workers (Offences) Act 2018; see offence wording document H19568.

judicialResults.label: Conditional discharge
judicialResults.resultText:
CD - Conditional discharge
Discharged conditionally for 4 Years.

offences.offenceLegislation: Contrary to section 1(1) and 7 of the Theft    Act 1968.
offences.offenceLegislationWelsh: Yn groes i adran 1(1) a 7 Deddf Dwyn 1968.
offences.wording: From 13th November 2018, an aggravated version of this offence applies where the offence is committed against an emergency worker acting in the exercise of his / her functions as such a worker, as per section 1 of the Assaults on emergency Workers (Offences) Act 2018; see offence wording document H19568.

judicialResults.label: Statutory Declaration
judicialResults.resultText:
STDEC - Statutory Declaration
Statutory declaration made under Section 14 of the Magistrates' Courts Act 1980.

type.applicationWording: Appears before the court in order to make a statutory declaration following conviction {1} by {2} on {3}. Original case number: {4}
type.applicationWordingWelsh: Yn ymddangos gerbron y llys er mwyn gwneud datganiad statudol yn dilyn euogfarn <[am y trosedd <Original Offence>][am y troseddau <Original Offences>]> gan <Court name> ar <Date of hearing>. Rhif yr Achos Gwreiddiol: <Original case number>
type.legislation: In accordance with section 14 of the Magistrates' Courts Act 1980.
type.legislationWelsh: Yn unol ag adran 14 Deddf Llysoedd Ynadon 1980.
type.type: Appearance to make statutory declaration (other than SJP)
